text: hi I'm Jason and I'm Niki we're a couple
of fun-loving adventure junkies addicted
to traveling but we do things a little
differently we always have our home with
us and our two cats
it all started six years ago we sold
everything and hit the road in search of
our own American Dream
because the whole 60-hour workweek a
mortgage
two and a half kids and if you survive
until you're 60 you can retire wasn't
our version of the American Dream what
we discovered along the way is a new way
of living a lifestyle where travel
adventures and home are one in the same
double rainbow all the way double
rainbow all the way it started with a
home on wheels now it's a home on the
water and who knows what's next over the
years we've learned we aren't the only
ones interested in this uncertain Terry
way of life for you we hear it all the
time you guys are living my dream to
which we respond man we're living our
dream but we'd love to show you how we
do it
because if we can do it so can you yeah
so join us together we'll go places
others only dream about
we'll climb mountains traverse wild
landscapes dive deep and discover
adventures we didn't know existed learn
about honored traditions experience
cultures and be a part of the
festivities will draw power from the Sun
forage for wild foods and visit local
farms we don't have one singular mission
or end goal it's a perpetual journey
with no end in sight we're going sailing
we'd love to have you along for the ride
and if we achieve our goal somewhere
along the way will inspire you to go out
and live your dream so hop on board with
us and let the adventure begin subscribe
here on YouTube connect with us and
learn how you can get involved on
patreon
